title: Don't You See My Jesus Coming
verses: Don't you see my Jesus coming! See him come in yonder cloud,
with ten thousand angels round him,How they do my Jesus crowd.
I am bound for the kingdom,Will you go to glory with me.
Hal-lelujah,O Hallelujah,I'm bound for the kingdom,will
you go to glory with me,Hallelujah,O praise ye the Lord.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Classic Millerite vision of Christ's return with angelic hosts
